faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our Android fake update screen

real.question: Is this a real Android update?
real.answer: No, this is a simulated screen designed for entertainment and testing purposes. It cannot actually update your device.

pranks.question: Can I use this for pranks?
pranks.answer: Yes! This tool is perfect for harmless tech pranks. Just remember to use it responsibly and with good humor.

realistic.question: How realistic is the simulation?
realistic.answer: Our Android update screen is designed to look very authentic, featuring animated loading progress and proper Android branding.

safe.question: Is it safe to use?
safe.answer: Absolutely! This is a web-based simulation that runs entirely in your browser and cannot access your system or device.
